styles: .image-content { background-repeat: no-repeat; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-size: cover; background-position: center; } .gradient-bg { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0; z-index: 100; display: flex; justify-content: center; } .gradient-bg .play-button { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; } .error-bg { background-color: #d8d8d8; display: flex; justify-content: center; } .error-content { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; } .video-content { height: 100%; width: 100%; object-fit: fill; }

:host { display: inline-block; } :host > * { float: left; } :host /deep/ * { box-sizing: border-box; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-icon { color: white; font-size: 25px; position: absolute; z-index: 2000; display: inline-block; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-icon .gocodee-gallery-icon-content { display: block; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-clickable { cursor: pointer; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-icons-wrapper .gocodee-gallery-icon { position: relative; margin-right: 5px; margin-top: 5px; font-size: 20px; cursor: pointer; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-icons-wrapper { float: right; } :host .gocodee-gallery-layout { width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; } :host .gocodee-gallery-layout.thumbnails-top gocodee-gallery-image { order: 2; } :host .gocodee-gallery-layout.thumbnails-top gocodee-gallery-thumbnails { order: 1; } :host .gocodee-gallery-layout.thumbnails-bottom gocodee-gallery-image { order: 1; } :host .gocodee-gallery-layout.thumbnails-bottom gocodee-gallery-thumbnails { order: 2; }

arguments.template: +{{remainingCountValue}}
styles: :host { width: 100%; display: inline-block; position: relative; } .gocodee-gallery-thumbnails-wrapper { width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; overflow: hidden; } .gocodee-gallery-thumbnails { height: 100%; width: 100%; position: absolute; left: 0px; transform: translateX(0); transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out; will-change: transform; } .gocodee-gallery-thumbnails .gocodee-gallery-thumbnail { position: absolute; height: 100%; background-position: center; background-repeat: no-repeat; text-decoration: none; } .gocodee-gallery-thumbnail-size-cover .gocodee-gallery-thumbnails .gocodee-gallery-thumbnail { background-size: cover; } .gocodee-gallery-thumbnail-size-contain .gocodee-gallery-thumbnails .gocodee-gallery-thumbnail { background-size: contain; } .gocodee-gallery-remaining-count-overlay { width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); } .gocodee-gallery-remaining-count { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); color: white; font-size: 30px; }

:host(.gocodee-gallery-active) { width: 100%; height: 100%; position: fixed; left: 0; top: 0; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); z-index: 10000; display: inline-block; } :host { display: none; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-arrow { font-size: 50px; } .gocodee-gallery-preview-img { opacity: 0; max-width: 90%; max-height: 90%; user-select: none; transition: transform .5s; } .gocodee-gallery-preview-img.animation { transition: opacity 0.5s linear, transform .5s; } .gocodee-gallery-preview-img.gocodee-gallery-active { opacity: 1; } .gocodee-gallery-preview-img.gocodee-gallery-grab { cursor: grab; cursor: -webkit-grab; } .gocodee-gallery-icon.gocodee-gallery-spinner { font-size: 50px; left: 0; display: inline-block; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-preview-top { position: absolute; width: 100%; user-select: none; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-preview-icons { float: right; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-preview-icons .gocodee-gallery-icon { position: relative; margin-right: 10px; margin-top: 10px; font-size: 25px; cursor: pointer; text-decoration: none; } :host /deep/ .gocodee-gallery-preview-icons .gocodee-gallery-icon.gocodee-gallery-icon-disabled { cursor: default; opacity: 0.4; } .gocodee-spinner-wrapper { width: 50px; height: 50px; display: none; } .gocodee-spinner-wrapper.gocodee-gallery-active { display: inline-block; } .gocodee-gallery-center { position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; margin: auto; top: 0; } .gocodee-gallery-preview-text { width: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); padding: 10px; text-align: center; color: white; font-size: 16px; flex: 0 1 auto; z-index: 10; } .gocodee-gallery-preview-wrapper { width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; flex-flow: column; } .gocodee-gallery-preview-img-wrapper { flex: 1 1 auto; position: relative; }

.gocodee-gallery-arrow-wrapper { position: absolute; height: 100%; width: 1px; display: table; z-index: 2000; table-layout: fixed; } .gocodee-gallery-arrow-left { left: 0px; } .gocodee-gallery-arrow-right { right: 0px; } .gocodee-gallery-arrow { top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%); cursor: pointer; } .gocodee-gallery-arrow.gocodee-gallery-disabled { opacity: 0.6; cursor: default; } .gocodee-gallery-arrow-left .gocodee-gallery-arrow { left: 10px; } .gocodee-gallery-arrow-right .gocodee-gallery-arrow { right: 10px; }

:host { width: 100%; display: inline-block; position: relative; } .gocodee-gallery-image-wrapper { width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; overflow: hidden; } .gocodee-gallery-image { background-position: center; background-repeat: no-repeat; height: 100%; width: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0px; } .gocodee-gallery-image.gocodee-gallery-active { z-index: 1000; } .gocodee-gallery-image-size-cover .gocodee-gallery-image { background-size: cover; } .gocodee-gallery-image-size-contain .gocodee-gallery-image { background-size: contain; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-fade .gocodee-gallery-image { left: 0px; opacity: 0; transition: 0.5s ease-in-out; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-fade .gocodee-gallery-image.gocodee-gallery-active { opacity: 1; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-slide .gocodee-gallery-image { transition: 0.5s ease-in-out; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-slide .gocodee-gallery-image.gocodee-gallery-active { left: 0px; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-slide .gocodee-gallery-image.gocodee-gallery-inactive-left { left: -100%; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-slide .gocodee-gallery-image.gocodee-gallery-inactive-right { left: 100%; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-rotate .gocodee-gallery-image { transition: 1s ease; transform: scale(3.5, 3.5) rotate(90deg); left: 0px; opacity: 0; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-rotate .gocodee-gallery-image.gocodee-gallery-active { transform: scale(1, 1) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-zoom .gocodee-gallery-image { transition: 1s ease; transform: scale(2.5, 2.5); left: 0px; opacity: 0; } .gocodee-gallery-animation-zoom .gocodee-gallery-image.gocodee-gallery-active { transform: scale(1, 1); opacity: 1; } .gocodee-gallery-image-text { width: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); padding: 10px; text-align: center; color: white; font-size: 16px; position: absolute; bottom: 0px; z-index: 10; }
